doc:
Maynard Eziashi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maynard_Eziashi 0 Maynard Eziashi (born 1965 in London, England) is a British Nigerian actor. In 1991, he won the Silver Bear for Best Actor at the 41st Berlin International Film Festival for his starring role in Mister Johnson (1990). Maynard_Eziashi ( born 1965 in London , England ) is a_British_Nigerian_actor . In 1991 , he won the_Silver Bear_for_Best_Actor at the_41st_Berlin_International_Film_Festival for his_starring_role in Mister_Johnson_(_1990_) .
